hero.title: Fiber Optic Infrastructure
hero.subtitle: FTTH, FTTO, LAN/WiFi and 4G/5G core network design and deployment. Complete monitoring with SolarWinds, Inteliphys Suites and C-net for reliable and secure connectivity.

items.title: FTTH & FTTO Network Audit
items.desc: Assessment of your fiber optic deployment needs for residential (FTTH) and professional (FTTO) environments with architecture recommendations and dimensioning.

items.title: 4G/5G Core Network Performance Audit
items.desc: In-depth analysis of your 4G/5G core network performance: latency, capacity, coverage and identification of optimization opportunities.

items.title: Fiber Optic Certification Consulting
items.desc: Support in the certification and qualification processes for fiber optic networks according to ANSI/TIA, ISO/IEC and ITU-T international standards.

items.title: NMS & IMS Strategy
items.desc: Advisory on the selection and deployment of Network Management System and Infrastructure Management System solutions adapted to your environment.

items.title: FTTH / FTTO Design & Engineering
items.desc: Complete design and deployment of FTTH (residential) and FTTO (enterprise) fiber optic infrastructure, from site survey to commissioning.

items.title: LAN & WiFi Network Design & Deployment
items.desc: Architecture and deployment of high-performance, secure and scalable enterprise wired LAN and WiFi networks per IEEE 802.11 standards.

items.title: 4G/5G Core Network Design & Engineering
items.desc: Design and engineering of 4G LTE and 5G NR core networks: architecture, dimensioning, integration and equipment optimization.

items.title: NMS & IMS Solutions Deployment
items.desc: Deployment and integration of SolarWinds, Inteliphys Suites and C-net for comprehensive supervision and management of your network infrastructure.

items.title: FTTH & FTTO Training
items.desc: Technical training on the design, deployment and maintenance of residential (FTTH) and professional (FTTO) fiber optic networks.

items.title: LAN & WiFi Networks Training
items.desc: Skills development in enterprise wired LAN and WiFi network design, deployment and administration.

items.title: 4G/5G Core Network Training
items.desc: In-depth training on 4G LTE and 5G NR core network architectures: EPC/5GC protocols, dimensioning and optimization.

items.title: SolarWinds & Inteliphys NMS/IMS Training
items.desc: Mastering SolarWinds, Inteliphys Suites and C-net monitoring tools for proactive and efficient management of your network infrastructure.

partners.title: Technology Partners
partners.subtitle: We collaborate with global leaders in network solutions to offer you the best technologies on the market

items.name: SolarWinds
items.desc: Global leader in network monitoring and management solutions (NMS). Real-time monitoring, proactive alerts, advanced dashboards and automated reporting.

items.name: Inteliphys Suites
items.desc: Complete infrastructure management suite (IMS): inventory, documentation, monitoring and lifecycle management of your fiber and copper network assets.

items.name: C-net
items.desc: Innovative solutions for telecom network management, documentation and optimization, offering total visibility across your entire infrastructure.
